Entries.wabiicecream: Hey farmer @!^I own a small ice cream truck up in Zuzu city but have been looking for a new place to set up shop for a while.^Robin mentioned your farm on my last trip to the valley and I think business could increase for the both of us if you let me park my truck there^... for a small investment fee^Go speak with Robin if you're interested in my proposal!^- Your new friend Daphne.[#]Daphnes Offer
